thread.section_title: BlueSun Vacations Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BlueSun Vacations | bluesunvacations.com | 10 of 63
thread.title: Colleen

author: Colleen
title: Colleen
text: We originally reached out to plan a family vacation to Punta Cana but abruptly switched gears and had Hew check out a Jamaican get away for my husband and me. Hew was great! Gave us great options within our budget and we were booked within a day or two! There was great communication and he got us the information we needed in a very timely manner. Would highly recommend Apple vacations. And ask for Hew!
